text: Thanks all, pleasure chatting to you and v inspiring. Team Collectively, drink in hand, now over and out for this evening #CSRChat
A15b: Sustainable choices have penetrated mainstream culture. People demand, companies provide. Simple. #CSRChat
A15: Success with Goal12? I’d be out of a job ☺ #CSRChat
A14: EVERYTHING intersects. There isn’t a single choice you make as a consumer that doesn’t impact on someone somewhere #CSRChat
To disrupt biz models, big corps need to experiment. Some biz as usual, some radical #sustainability disruptions #CSRChat
Q13: Not about CSR budgets? Better to ENABLE sustainable consumption rather than promote it. Big cos must pioneer new models #BCorp #CSRChat
A12b: Liking new @REI #optoutside campaign an antidote to Black Friday. Could a FTSE or S&P500 retailer do this? #CSRChat
A12a: Inglorious Fruits from @Intermarche - making ‘ugly’ fruit attractive. Why hasn't this gone further? https://t.co/Twv4rLAQSw #CSRChat
A11: Priorities? Let's start with waste – everyone hates it. V emotive. See UK’s new #wastenot campaign #CSRChat
A10a: Any companies trying to target millennials. This generation is demanding differently and brands need to respond #CSRChat
A broken world means broken marketplaces – it’s in companies’ self interest to take action on #sustainableconsumption #CSRChat
@SherSustainable @JohnFriedman Education is key but even more important is penetrating culture - what's normalised and cool #CSRChat
A8: Not high enough yet! Tackling sustainable consumption seriously requires business model rethink #CSRChat
Let's remember most consumption decisions are a lot less than rational. Insight & emotional connection, please take a bow #CSRChat
@GlobalGoodTweet 4Bn metric tonnes of waste is staggering. Waste per person per week amongst most wealthy 1% even more so #CSRChat
A4c: We do that through storytelling, campaigning, insight, and bringing together partners to co-create new solutions #CSRChat
A4b: We want to explore and grow the intersection between what the world needs, and the kinds of lives young people want to live #CSRChat
A4a: At @_Collectively we bring together big companies & brands https://t.co/uVQ6lQOWXd, NGOs, entrepreneurs together with audience #CSRChat

A3a:  Started at @WEF in Davos: companies wanting to drive #responsibleconsumption but knew they couldn’t do it alone #CSRChat
A2b: Billions of buying and consuming decisions every minute x decision impact = a whole lot of impact #CSRChat
A2a: A shift from conspicuous to conscious consumption will create a more sustainable world & support those doing good #GlobalGoals #CSRChat
A1b: Our vision @_collectively is to help make sustainable ways of living the #newnormal through collaboration #CSRChat
A1a: More than excited to join #CSRChat. I’m Will Gardner and I’m lucky to lead a fabulous team at  @_collectively #CSRChat
